str2: And if, even if, even, at least. From kai and ean; and if.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Probably from the base of harpazo; fruit, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
But if not, else, otherwise. From ei, de, and me; but if not.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To cut out (off, away), remove, prevent. From ek and kopto; to exscind; figuratively, to frustrate.
